episodes.title: The Cartel Leader Who Wrote a Bible & Built A Cult: Nazario Moreno
episodes.description: This true-crime documentary explores the bizarre and disturbing rise of Nazario Moreno González, the cartel boss who wrote his own bible and built a cult-like following. Blending religious ideology with ruthless cartel violence, Moreno crafted a belief system that portrayed criminal activity as moral duty. We break down how he used scripture, psychological control, and spiritual messaging to recruit loyal followers and justify extreme brutality. From sermons to propaganda, his methods transformed a criminal organization into something far more dangerous. This video examines the manipulation, mythology, and power behind one of the most unusual figures in cartel history — and how belief became a weapon in Mexico’s narco war.
